Я потратил на эту игру кучу денег и ни о чем не жалею! Эта игры одновременно и самое лучшее и самое худшее, что со мной случалось! Я обожаю все баги, всех токсиков и прочих сущностей этой игры( ну и саму Сущность тоже). Игра улучшается с каждым патчем, и я очень хочу, чтобы разработчики продолжали в том же духе. You did a pretty good job so far!
топ игра, дешевая, советую
都说这个游戏对新手不太友好，其实操作真的很简单，刚开始入门的玩家可以看一些b站解说拒绝或者黎明杀机193的视频，然后尝试一些简单的屠夫比如夹子或者小叮当，等你玩屠夫感觉到吃力的时候可以去选择玩一些人类，乐趣真的很多的，适合喜欢恐怖片和恐怖游戏的人入手。玩这个游戏摆正好心态，玩人类被屠夫针对或者玩屠夫人类速修都是有的，就把每局当一次恐怖片来玩，不要太认真这游戏就会变得非常好玩

This game is really good do not get me wrong, good characters, good gameplay, but the one thing is, are all the massive amounts of bugs and network issues, a lot of the time even if you're new you will experience bugs, for example there are a good chunk of connection issues where xbox players when playing with other xbox players with pc players they cannot accept invites, making someone else having to be host, gameplay wise after you've vaulted a window a good chunk of the time even after you're pretty far away from the window you'll get hit so many bugs but overall a really good game would reccommend.
10/10 would play again.

I just came back to the game after about a year and a half of not playing and I would like to say that this game is a ton of fun. That said, let me explain why I have fun and why I own the game. 

To start, I own the game because my wife plays and she managed to get a few of our other friends into playing. I survive with her and a few of our friends when we play together and it is a blast. Surviving is particularly hard and I am not great at it, but when playing with friends it is so much better than playing with random people. Groups are just more capable at overcoming overbearing killers and it helps to temper the frustration when everybody is laughing together or sharing the experience of suffering while talking about it. 

If you don't have friends you intend to play with, I suggest examining other MP games that are competitive such as DOTA, LoL, Overwatch, CS:GO, etc. If you are frustrated by a lack of teamwork and hate playing alone in other MP games, then you probably won't find this game much different. The only big difference is that you can't chat with teammates in game unless you use an outside voice call. 

If you are still with me then let me say that while I enjoy surviving with friends, I LOVE killing alone. Now first, killers are always solo so playing alone isn't an issue. There is a lack of interaction that can suck, but when you get to terrify survivors as you destroy their hope of getting out alive with the item they hoped to make it through with, it is just a lot of fun. To put it simply, I have spent most of my time playing my best killer "The Wraith" and leveling him up while spending a significantly lesser amount of time leveling up other killers that I play every now and again. I don't like being chased, but chasing others and outsmarting their attempt to escape is really satisfying. It gets even more satisfying when you get to lower ranks and play against more skilled survivors. 

This coupled with the introduction of compendiums that provide more goals to work towards besides daily quests and leveling up makes the game feel fun and goal driven. It rewards you appropriately in my mind and overall is just an enjoyable experience. 

If you are still on the fence, I suggest looking at how you enjoy other multiplayer games and decide if this game will be any different. Killing is the most unique part of this game since it requires no teamwork at all. You live and unfortunately let live by your own mistakes which can be infuriating, but can also be insanely rewarding when your adrenaline is pumping and you manage to land the hit to stop a person from escaping at the last possible second to take them back to a hook and destroy their chance of escaping. As a killer, I couldn't love this game more for the experience I have.
